name: LogicaCOVID19FHIRProfileLibraryIG
title: Logica COVID-19 FHIR Profile Library IG
description: The COVID-19 IG describes structured data to be collected and communicated between providers and aggregators.

resource.name: COVID 19 Exposure Core profile
resource.description: A parent, abstract profile to be used for the CDC COVID 19 PUI report form exposure section elements.

resource.name: COVID 19 Exposure Questionnaire
resource.description: A list of questions about one's exposure history for COVID 19.

resource.name: COVID-19 gastrointestinal and hepatic underlying condition
resource.description: An assertion that a specific gastrointestinal or hepatic condition is present as an underlier to COVID-19.

resource.name: COVID-19 hemoglobinopathy underlying condition
resource.description: An assertion that a specific hemoglobinopathy condition is present as an underlier to COVID-19.

resource.name: COVID-19 ICD 10 Diagnosis
resource.description: A diagnosis or diagnoses asserted about the subject that is due to infection by the SARS coronavirus 2 virus and using codes specific to the ICD 10 code system.

resource.name: COVID-19 immune underlying condition
resource.description: An assertion that a specified immune condition is present as an underlier to COVID-19.

resource.name: COVID-19 renal underlying condition
resource.description: An assertion that a specific renal condition is present as an underlier to COVID-19.

resource.name: COVID-19 respiratory underlying condition
resource.description: An assertion that a specific respiratory condition is present as an underlier to COVID-19.

resource.name: COVID-19 SNOMED Diagnosis
resource.description: A diagnosis or diagnoses asserted about the subject that is due to infection by the SARS coronavirus 2 virus and using codes specifically from the SNOMED CT code system.

resource.name: COVID 19 Symptoms Absent
resource.description: A parent profile for the assertion of the Absence COVID 19 symptoms.

resource.name: COVID 19 Symptoms Present
resource.description: A parent profile for the assertion of the presence COVID 19 symptoms.

resource.name: COVID-19 uncategorized underlying condition
resource.description: An assertion that an uncategorized medical condition is present as an underlier to COVID-19.

resource.name: COVID-19 cardiovascular underlying condition
resource.description: An assertion that a specific cardiovascular condition is present as an underlier to COVID-19.

resource.name: COVID-19 Underlying Medical Condition observation
resource.description: The structure for the observations of named underlying conditions of COVID 19.

resource.name: COVID-19 immunocompromised underlying condition
resource.description: An assertion that a specific immunocompromised condition is present as an underlier to COVID-19.

resource.name: COVID-19 General Underlying Conditions Absent
resource.description: An assertion that generalized conditions such as chronic respiratory disease ARE NOT present along with the COVID-19 disease.

resource.name: COVID-19 General Underlying Conditions Present
resource.description: An assertion that generalized conditions such as chronic respiratiory disease or chronic metabolic disease are also present with the COVID-19 disease.

resource.name: COVID-19 metabolic underlying condition
resource.description: An assertion that a specific metabolic condition is present as an underlier to COVID-19.

resource.name: COVID-19 neurologic underlying condition
resource.description: An assertion that a specific neuroligical condition is present as an underlier to COVID-19.

resource.name: Case-Patient Report Identifying Information
resource.description: The identifying information for a reportable disease or condition.

resource.name: Coded Laboratory Observation Base
resource.description: Abstract base class for coded laboratory observations.

resource.name: Exposure Type
resource.description: Exposure Type is a description of how, when, where, and with whom and individual was exposed to SARS CoV 2 virus.

resource.name: Influenza virus A and B RNA and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene panel - Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: Influenza virus A and B RNA and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene panel - Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection is a laboratory panel for the detection of Influenza A, B, and SARS CoV 2.

resource.name: Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) identified in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) identified in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection is a laboratory test for the detection of Flu A or B or SARS CoV 2 via nucleic acid amplification.

resource.name: Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) and SARS-related CoV RNA panel - Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) and SARS-related CoV RNA panel - Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection is a laboratory test for the detection of Influenza A or B, SARS coronavirus 2, or SARS Cov via nucleic acid amplification.

resource.name: Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) and Respiratory syncytial virus RNA panel - Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: A set of lab tests for SARS-CoV-2, RSV, and Influenza Virus A and B.

resource.name: Influenza virus A and B and SARS-CoV+SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ag panel - Upper respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
resource.description: A set of lab tests for SARS-CoV-2, SARS-CoV, and Influenza A and B antigens via rapid immunoassay.

resource.name: Influenza virus A RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: Influenza virus A RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection is a qualitative lab test for the detection of Flu A in respiratory specimens via nucleic acid amplification with probe detection.

resource.name: Influenza virus B RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: Influenza virus B RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection is a qualitative lab test for the detection of Flu B in respiratory specimens via nucleic acid amplification with probe detection.

resource.name: Gamma interferon background [Units/volume] in Blood by Immunoassay
resource.description: A lab test to quantify the background gamma interferon in blood via immunoassay.

resource.name: Gestational Age at Onset of Illness
resource.description: The number of weeks the subject was pregnant when a given illness began.

resource.name: Human coronavirus 229E+HKU1+OC43+NL63 RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
resource.description: Humancoronavirus229EHKU1OC43NL63RNAPrThrPtNphOrdNonprobeamptar is a test for the Human coronavirus 229EHKU1, OC43, NL63 nucleaic acids in nasopharynx specimens via non-probe, target amplification method

resource.name: Human coronavirus 229E RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
resource.description: Humancoronavirus229ERNAPrThrPtNphOrdNonprobeamptarLabObs is a test for the Human coronavirus 229E nucleaic acid in nasopharynx specimens via non-probe, target amplification method.

resource.name: Human coronavirus HKU1 RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
resource.description: HumancoronavirusHKU1RNAPrThrPtNphOrdNonprobeamptarLabObs is a test for the Human coronavirus HKU1 nucleaic acid in nasopharynx specimens via non-probe, target amplification method.

resource.name: Human coronavirus NL63 RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
resource.description: HumancoronavirusNL63RNAPrThrPtNphOrdNonprobeamptarLabObs is a test for the Human coronavirus NL63 nucleaic acid in nasopharynx specimens via non-probe, target amplification method.

resource.name: Human coronavirus OC43 RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
resource.description: HumancoronavirusOC43RNAPrThrPtNphOrdNonprobeamptarLabObs is a test for the Human coronavirus OC43 nucleaic acid in nasopharynx specimens via non-probe, target amplification method.

resource.name: Influenza virus A Ag [Presence] in Nasopharynx by Rapid immunoassay
resource.description: A qualitative lab test for the detection of Influenza A antigen in nasopharynx specimens via rapid immunoassay.

resource.name: Influenza virus B Ag [Presence] in Nasopharynx by Rapid immunoassay
resource.description: A qualitative lab test for the detection of Influezna B antigen in nasopharynx specimens via rapid immunoassay.

resource.name: Known Exposure
resource.description: Known Exposure is an observation to state that it is known that an individual has or has not been exposed to a contagion.

resource.name: Laboratory Observation Base
resource.description: Abstract base class for laboratory observations.

resource.name: Laboratory Observation Panel Base
resource.description: A panel that contains member observations

resource.name: Mitogen stimulated gamma interferon [Units/volume] corrected for background in Blood
resource.description: A lab test to quantify mitogen stimulated gamma interferon, corrected for background, in blood via immunoassay.

resource.name: Mitogen stimulated gamma interferon [Units/volume] in Blood
resource.description: A lab test to quantify mitogen stimualted gamma interferon in blood via immunoassay.

resource.name: Pregnancy Status
resource.description: An individual's pregnancy state.

resource.name: Quantitative Laboratory Observation Base
resource.description: Abstract base class for quantitative laboratory observations.

resource.name: Respiratory syncytial virus RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: A qualitative lab test for the detection of RSV in respiratory specimens via NAA with probe detection.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgG Ab [Presence] in DBS by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARCCoV2AbIgGPrThrPtBldDotOrsdIA is a test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgG antibody via immunoassay on blood filer paper.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARSCoV2AbACncPtSerPlasQnIA is a quantitative test for the amount of SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) anitboy in serum or plasma via immnoassay.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgA Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma, or Blood by Rapid imunoassay
resource.description: SARSCoV2AbIgAPrThrPtSerPlasBldOrdIARapid is a test for the presence of the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgA antibody in serum, plasma, or blood via rapid immunoassay.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgA + IgM [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARSCoV2AbIgAplusIgMPrThrPtSerPlasordIA is a qualitative test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgA or IgM antibodies via immunoassay in serum or plasma specimens.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARSCoV2AbPrThrPtSerPlasOrdIA is a test for the detection of antibodies to SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) via imunoassay in serum or plasma.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) Ag [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
resource.description: SARSCoV2AgRespQlIArapidLabObs is a test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) antigen via rapid immunoassay. LOINC code 94558-4.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) E gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2EgenePrThrPtRespOrdProbAmpTar is a test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) E gene via NAA with probe detection in respiratory specimens

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) E gene [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2EgenePrThrPtSerPlasOrdProbAmpTar is a test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) E gene via NAA probe detection in serum or plasma specimens.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2NgenePrThrPtNphOrdProbAmpTar is a test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene via target amplification in nasopharynx specimens

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using CDC primer-probe set N1
resource.description: SARSCoV2NgenePrThrPtRespOrdProbAmpTarN1 is a test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene via nucleic acid amplification using CDC primer-probe set N1 in respiratory specimens.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Nucleaic acid amplification using CDC primer-probe set N2
resource.description: SARSCoV2NgenePrThrPtRespOrdProbAmpTarN2 is a test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene via nucleic acid amplification using CDC primer-probe set N2 in respiratroty specimens

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene [Presence] in Saliva (oral fluid) by Nucleic acid amplification using CDC primer-probe set N1
resource.description: A qualitative lab test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 N gene in saliva via NAA with the CDC primer-probe set N1

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2NgenePrThrPtSerPlasOrdProbAmpTar is a test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene via NAA probe detection in serum or plasma specimens.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using primer-probe set N1
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2NgenePrThrPtXXXOrdPrbAmpTarPrimerProbeSetN1 is a test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA using the CDC defined method of probe amplification target primer probe set N1 and used for non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94307-6.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using primer-probe set N2
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2NgenePrThrPtXXXOrdPrbAmpTarPrimerProbeSetN2 is a test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA using the CDC defined method of probe amplification target primer probe set N2 and used for non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94308-4.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using primer-probe set N1
resource.description: SARSCoV2NgeneThreshNumPtXXXQnPrbAmpTarPrimerProbeSetN1LabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene via the probe target amplification, primer probe set N1 method in non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94311-8.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using primer-probe set N2
resource.description: SARSCoV2NgeneThreshNumPtXXXQnPrbAmpTarPrimerProbeSetN2LabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene via the probe target amplification, primer probe set N2 method in non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94312-6.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) ORF1ab region [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2ORF1abRespQlNAAprobeLabObs is a laboratory test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) antibody via target amplification probe detection. LOINC code 94559-2.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
resource.description: SARSCoV2PrThrPtXXXOrdOrganismSpecificCulture is a test for the detection of growth of the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) organism via organism specific culture.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA [Cycle Threshold#] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2RNACycleThresholdRespQnNAAProbAmpTar is a quantitative test for SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA via NAA with probe dection cycle threshold # in respiratory specimens.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA [Log#/volume] (viral load) in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2RNALnCncPtXXXQnProbAmpTar is a quantitative test for the viral load (log number per volume) of SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA via NAA probe detection in unspecified specimens.

resource.name: SARS-Cov-2 (COVID19) RNA panel - Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2RNAPnlXXXNAAprobeLabObs is a colection of tests for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) organism. LOINC code 94306-8.

resource.name: Sars-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2RNAPrThrPtNphOrsdProbAmpTar is a test for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA via probe target amplification in nasopharynx specimens.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA [Presence] in Saliva (oral fluid) by NAA with probe
resource.description: SARSCoV2RNAPrThrPtSalivaOrdProbAmpTar is a qualitative test for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA via NAA probe detection in saliva (oral fluid).

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA [Presence] in Saliva (oral fluid) by Sequencing
resource.description: SARSCoV2RNAPrThrPtSalivaOrdSequencing is a qualitative test for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA via RNA sequencing in saliva (oral fluid) specimen.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA [Cycle Threshold#] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2RNAThreshNumPtXXXQnProbAmpTar is a quantitative test for SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) RNA via NAA with probe detection and a threshold number detection limit in unspecified specimens.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) RdRp gene [Presence] in Lower respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: A qualitative lab test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 RdRp gene in lower respiratory tract specimens via NAA with probe detection.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) S gene [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2SgenePrThrPtSerPlasOrdProbAmpTar is test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) S gene via target amplification in serum or plasma specimens.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) and SARS-related CoV RNA panel - Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: A set of lab tests for SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-related coronavirus RNA in respiratory specimens via NAA with probe detection.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) specific TCRB gene rearrangements [Presence] in Blood by Sequencing
resource.description: A qualitative lab test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 specific TCRB gene in blood via sequencing.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) S protein RBD neutralizing antibody [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: A qualitative lab test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 S protein RBD neutralizing antibody in serum or plasma via immunoassay.

resource.name: SARS CoV-2 stimulated gamma interferon release by T-cells [Units/volume] corrected for background in Blood
resource.description: A lab test for the quantification of the SARS-CoV-2 stimulated gamma interferon release by T-cells in blood, corrected for background.

resource.name: SARS CoV-2 stimulated gamma interferon release by T-cells [Units/volume] in Blood
resource.description: A lab test for the quantification of the SARS-CoV-2 stimualted interferon release by T-cells in blood.

resource.name: SARS-coV-2 (COVID19) whole genome [Nucleiotide sequence] in Isolate by Sequencing
resource.description: SARSCoV2wholegenomeSeqPtIsolateNomSequencing is a test to sequence the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) genome from an isolate specimen with coded results

resource.name: SARS-CoV + SARS-Cov-2 (COVID19) Ag [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
resource.description: SARSCoronavirusPlusSARSCoV2AgPrThrPtRespOrdIARapid is a qualitative test for the detection of SARS-Cov or SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) antigens via rapdi immunoassay in respiratory specimens.

resource.name: SARS-like coronavirus N gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSLikecoronavirusNGenePrThrPtXXXOrdPrbAmpTarLabObs is a test for the SARS-like coronavirus N gene in non-respiratory specimens and via the probe target amplification method. LOINC code 94310-0.

resource.name: SARS-like coronavirus N gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSLikecoronavirusNGeneThreshNumPtXXXQnPrbAmpTarLabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS-like coronavirus N gene via the probe target amplification method and a threshold for detection in non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94313-4.

resource.name: SARS-related coronavirus RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSRelatedCoronavirusRNAPrThrPtRespOrdPrbAmpTar is a test for the SARS coronavirus related RNA (gene not specified). LOINC code 94502-2.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgA Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgAACncPtSerPlasQnIALabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgA antibody, arbitrary concentration, via immunoassay.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgA Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgAPrThrPtSerPlasOrdIALabObs is a qualitative test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgA antibody in serum or plasma via immunoassay.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgA Ab [Titer] in Serum or Plasma by Immunofluorescence
resource.description: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgA Ab [Titer] in Serum or Plasma by Immunofluorescence is a titer laboratory test that measures SARS-CoV-2 IgA antibodies in serum or plasma via immunoflourescence.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgG Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgGAcncPtSerPlasQnIALabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgG antibody via immunoassay. LOINC code 94505-5.

resource.description: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG+IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay is a qualitative test for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 IgG or IgM antibodies in serum, plasma, or blood via rapid immunoassay.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgG+IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgGPlusIgMPrThrPtSerPlasOrdIALabObs is a test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgG and IgM antibodies via immunoassay. It does not differentiate which is detected. LOINC code 94547-7.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
resource.description: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay is a qualitative lab test for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 IgG antibody in serum, plasma, or blood by rapid ummunoassay.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgGPrThrPtSerPlasOrdIALabObs is a qualitative test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgG antibody via immunoassay.

resource.description: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Titer] in Serum or Plasma by Immunofluorescence is a titer laboratory test that measures SARS-CoV-2 IgG anitbodies in serum or plasma via immunoflourescence.

resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgMAcncPtSerPlasQnIALabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgM antibody via immunoassay. LOINC code 94506-3.

resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgMPrThrPtSerPlasOrdIALabObs is a test for the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) IgM antibody in serum or plasma via immunoassay.

resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgMPrThrPtSerPlasOrdIArapidLabObs is a test for the SARS coronavisus 2 IgM antibody via rapid immunoassay. LOINC code 94508-9.

resource.description: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum or Plasma by Immunofluorescence is a titer laboratory test that measures SARS-CoV-2 IgM antibodies in serum or plasma via immmunoflourescence.

resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbImpPtSerPlasNomLabObs is an impression or interpretation of a specified SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) lab test.  Values are Positive or Negative.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) neutralizing antibody [Presence] in Serum by pVNT

resource.description: A qualitative lab test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 antibody in DBS via immunoassay.

resource.description: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection is a quantitative lab test for the measurement of the number of Log_copies of SARS-CoV-2 in respiratory specimens via NAA with probe detection method.

resource.name: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2NGenePrThrPtRespOrdPrbAmpTar is the qualitative lab test for the detection of the SARS-CoV-2 (COVID19) N gene. LOINC code 94533-7.
